about.title: About Us
text:
Being passionate fans of sports like skiing, climbing, hiking and kayaking,
after a short deliberation we chose ‚Äî believe it or not ‚Äî Italy!

We have traveled a lot, especially with skis.
The Alps attract so much that one trip becomes the start of a tradition.

The Alps mean mountains inspire, service takes care,
we fully accompany you, and you simply enjoy.
With us, vacation is that very Vacation you dream about.
about.whyUsText1: We decided that making La Vacanza Bianca for our clients that wonderful time when you don't have to worry about anything except the very fact of arriving in Italy ‚Äì that's a great idea.

whyUsList.item1: We will meet you right at the arrival area of Milan or Bergamo airport at any time
whyUsList.item2: We will take you to the hotel
whyUsList.item3: We will drive you from the hotel to the nearest parking near the lifts. And back
whyUsList.item4: We will help you choose and rent equipment and buy ski passes
whyUsList.item5: Together we will discuss and choose the slopes for the current day
whyUsList.item6: We will get on the lift with you and be with you all day so you don't worry about anything
whyUsList.item7: On the rest day, we will take you shopping, for a city walk, or to a hiking trail
whyUsList.item8: We will deliver you safe, sound, and happy to the airport

resorts.title: Best Ski Resorts in Italy
resorts.subtitle: We work at the most prestigious Alpine resorts

pianiDiBobbio.name: Piani di Bobbio
pianiDiBobbio.description: Special 25% discount! Perfect resort for those who want to ski near Milan. Modern lifts, 40+ km of trails for all levels, and traditional Italian atmosphere. Great choice for first-time Alpine experience.

madesimo.name: Madesimo
madesimo.description: Picturesque Valchiavenna valley with steep slopes and 60+ km of trails. Ideal for experienced skiers seeking a challenge. Elevation up to 2900 m guarantees excellent snow all season.

bivio.name: Bivio
bivio.description: Cozy Swiss village at Julier Pass at 1769 m elevation. Ideal for families: peaceful atmosphere, varied trails for all levels, and direct access to lifts right from the hotel. Great choice for those seeking comfortable skiing without the hustle of large resorts.
highlights: Ski school for children from 3 years

sanktMoritz.name: Sankt Moritz
sanktMoritz.description: Legendary Swiss resort - birthplace of winter tourism. 350+ km of trails at elevations up to 3300 m, luxury hotels and restaurants. For those who value prestige and elegance.

valmalenco.name: Valmalenco
valmalenco.description: Authentic Italian valley without tourist crowds. 40+ km of trails from 1200 to 2700 m, excellent freeride conditions. Ideal for those seeking a true Italian experience away from popular routes.

aprica.name: Aprica
aprica.description: Cozy family resort at 1180‚Äì2300 m elevation. 50+ km of trails perfect for beginners and intermediate skiers. Excellent infrastructure, children's schools, and peaceful atmosphere make it ideal for first-time alpine skiing experience.

livigno.name: Livigno
livigno.description: Farthest resort (200+ km from Milan), but one of Italy's highest-altitude resorts (1816‚Äì2900 m). 115 km of trails, duty-free zone, and affordable prices. Long skiing season thanks to elevation. Great choice for those not afraid of a long drive.
